query:
SELECT
                avatar_url,
                banner_url,
                bio,
                description,
                display_name,
                username,
                (
                  SELECT COUNT(*)
                  FROM newsletter_issues
                  WHERE published_at IS NOT NULL
                    AND users.user_id = newsletter_issues.user_id
                ) AS "total_issues!: i64"
              FROM users
              JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id
              WHERE users.username = $1
